title: Decaying Champion Points. (or something along those lines)
body:
The new CM allows summoners to feel proud of titles that they have earned through playing there mains.
But without a decaying system or a system to check to see if you actually deserve it.
Bad players can just keep playing until they reach lvl 5.

Ive had multiple games where Ive had Banners on my team and they did great.
Made it feel more awesome, knowing that this guy knows how to play X - Y champ.

However, Ive also had games where in loading screen X-Y summoner has a banner.
and they are terra-bad. Walking into every skill shot, cannot CS. Doesn't build right and blah-blah.

There should be a way to make someone lose there banners or drop them, because some people don't deserve them at all.
Why be good, when you can just play 25 games is and reach lvl 4.
I find this unfair to those who are actually good at X-Y champions, and have actually mastered them.
because now it doesn't feel like an achievement when a challenger and get lvl 5 on Bard, and a shit bad unranked can also do the same while loosing 100% of his games.

replies.body:
Why are you judging people by their banners? If someone has a skin, does that make that player amazing at that champion?

Honestly, the champion mastery is there to show people you've played that champion many times. Everyone learns champions at a different pace and at different levels of skill. Just because someone doesn't play to YOUR expected level, doesn't mean they need to be punished for it. It's not like everyone's a challenger

1. I said nothing about skins.
2. Its champion "Mastery" key word in that. I can understand that reading can be hard sometimes but try it, it works wonders.

the whole point of Champion mastery is to show your team that you have mastered that champion.
Its an achievement, as I have said (If you can read).
Someone thats challenger can master Bard lets say and be really good and get lvl 5 as him, and feel like they have achieved something.
But some guy thats lvl X or unranked or whatever elo. can do really shit or average (Basically not properly earn it)
and can reach lvl 5.

Im saying its not fair on those who actually work for there mastery points.
because why bother to master when you can feed intentionally forever and still get the banners for them.

Try to read this this time.

No need to make a personal attack mate :)
This isn't the Rift so let's keep our salt levels low

I don't understand why anyone would feed intentionally just to gain a D grade mastery points, but if you think someone will do that, I guess there may be some people who would. Honestly, no-one can judge how good you need to be to get Level 5 in mastery points. How will you differentiate a level 5 mastery of a challenger to a bronze? How will the system keep up if you get promoted from bronze to silver to gold? Would you need to redo your Champion Mastery? Honestly, your idea isn't that well thought out practicality wise.

It's not up to you to judge who is good at what champion. If they have an off day on that champion, do they not deserve their level 5 title? It's a game mate, just have fun and try to get your level 5 masteries and not worry about how "poorly" you think someone else is doing, because by the looks of it, if any challenger was to watch you play, you'd be pretty crap and don't deserve a mastery level 5 in any champion

Point still stands though.
Its suppose to be an achievement, earning the right to have that banner and that emote.
 Instead of feeding your way through to the top.

Maybe this is where the "Unskilled" report comes into play, enough of those on X champs and it might considering dropping your banner.

I know its a new system but I would like to earn my lvl 5 and feel like I have actually achieved something.
Because when I see another person play a champion that I love and have lvl 5 on. And they have it as well but they cannot do shit and they just losed a whole bunch of games to "Earn" there banner annoys me to no end.

Im sure you love X champion, lets just say its Teemo (Hue)
You legit earn your way to lvl 5 you know him in and out.
Then in another game, someone plays teemo. (Your champion)
Has a banner as well, but feeds relentlessly and doesn't communicate.

How is it suppose to be an achievement then?

I do understand that this is new and where your coming from, but This still needs work.
